main event: Mr. Carlo Gattini reported observing three silver-colored, disc-shaped objects flying in formation over the city of Rome at approximately 2200 hours on 6 September 1960.
interesting points: The objects were flying in formation and hovered silently for about 5 minutes., The sighting was part of a historical document related to Project Blue Book., The report was filed with the Foreign Technology Division., In addition to Rome, sightings also reported objects over Ravenna., The objects were described as dark triangular shapes during the Ravenna sighting on 22 September 1960.
witness description: Mr. Carlo Gattini, a resident of Rome, Italy
